## Config interface

A configuration interface for Lynx Config defined by `@lynx-js/type-config`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Config extends LynxConfig, LynxCompilerOptions 
```
**Extends:** LynxConfig, LynxCompilerOptions
